overview: Three minutes of bliss for lovers of jazz. This ingeniously dynamic flight-of-fancy, set to a Stan Getz bebop groove, creates a series of wildly inventive visualizations that perfectly match the ebb and flow of the music on the soundtrack. There's a kind of method in the madness, with imaginary machines poking, prodding, pumping and pounding out an abstract flow of....well, something that begins as sound and ends mysteriously.
title: Mechaniek
